articles.author: Esther Webber, Clea Caulcutt
articles.title: UK and France must save Europe, says Macron - politico.eu
articles.description: “Our two countries have a special responsibility for the security of the continent,” the French president said in an address to both Houses of Parliament.
articles.content: Macron used the address to underline his commitment to the “coalition of the willing,” the initiative spearheaded by the U.K. and France to protect any Ukrainian ceasefire, which the French president… [+1485 chars]
